title: Test Application Error Handling
description: An IT auditor tests how an application handles errors to ensure data integrity.

tasks.description: Attempt to import a data file with incorrect formatting into the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application should reject the entire file and create a log of the formatting errors.

tasks.description: Simulate a network interruption during a large transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application should roll back the incomplete transaction, leaving no partial data in the database.

tasks.description: Review the error logs to ensure that all failed transactions are properly logged for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms that the error logs are detailed and accurate.
